name: attendance-app-root
description: Root package for the attendance app

scripts.build: ls -la && mkdir -p app/client && cp -r client/* app/client/ && cp -r server app/ && cp vite.config.ts app/ && cd app && npm install --production=false && cd client && npx vite build && cd .. && npx esbuild server/index.ts --platform=node --bundle --external:@google-cloud/* --external:lightningcss --external:@babel/* --format=cjs --outfile=dist/server.js
